FILE: cm432435v11.0.txt
DYAD: MALI - MAURITANIA
RIVALRY: RIV1050
DISPUTE(S): MID1410 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180702
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180914

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID1410

TERRMID: MID1410 1 -- territory MID
TERRMID-CER: MID1410 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: MID1410 from Library of Congress, Mali and Mauritania were involved in an ongoing border dispute during this time. From Gibler 2018, Mali and Mauritania exchanged fire between their police forces across the disputed border. Coded territorial MID because the fire was exchanged in regards to their border dispute. 

TERRLINK: MID1410 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID1410 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID1410 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID1410 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID1410 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID1410 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES:

CIVWARMID-CER: MID1410 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID1410 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID1410 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID1410 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID1410 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES:

COUPLINK-CER: MID1410 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID4364

TERRMID: MID4364 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID4364 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID4364 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID4364 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID4364 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID4364 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID4364 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID4364 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID4364 1 -- civil war MID
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4364 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES: MID4364 from cm narrative, Malian military forces went on heightened alert and began a security sweep of the region bordering Mauritania after the government received reports of Islamic rebels crossing the border into Mali from Mauritania. Coded civil war MID because this was connected to militarized rebels in Mali and Mauritania. 

CIVWARLINK: MID4364 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4364 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID4364 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID4364 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4364 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4364 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID4 2002-2010:

MID4364
rivalry=432435 nationa=MALI nationb=MAURITANIA MID4364 20031226-20031226 
 revtype1a=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=NONE fatalpa=0 lhosta=DISPLAY OF FORCE 
 revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE fatalpb=0
lhostb=NO MILITARIZED ACTION 

Malian military forces went on heightened alert and began a security sweep of the region bordering Mauritania after the government received reports of Islamic rebels crossing the border into Mali from Mauritania. First day of dispute was on 12/26/2003 and last day of dispute was on 12/26/2003.

RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:

SOURCES-CM:

NARRATIVE-CR:

SOURCES-CR:

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield. 

Library of Congress: Mauritania a country study page 152
